title: serinzo
author: serinzo
content: Can we tweak or convert ANTMINER S9 14Th/s To Do mining in other algorithm like Litecoin or Monero?Thanks

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: serinzo on October 31, 2023, 07:53:32 PMCan we tweak or convert ANTMINER S9 14Th/s To Do mining in other algorithm like Litecoin or Monero?Thanks Theoretically, this can be done, but the hashrate will be very small and the consumption will be very high, due to the fact that the chips in this ASIC are made for mining a specific SHA256 algorithm. So you can use this ASIC for any coins with the SHA256 algorithm. This is the main problem with ASICs, as opposed to video cards.
